title: Operations Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Making Waves Foundation
Interview Descriptions: 30min phone interview with "Ms. Fries". I did not get great vibes after she spent 10 minutes on how SHE single-handedly created the program and took credit for all its outcomes. I know racial capitalism well in the non-profit world and this is a leader cashing in big on it.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a manager you worked well with? A manager you did not work well with?

title: Junior Accountant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Making Waves Foundation (Richmond, CA) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: Very straightforward and asked about personal development. Not a lot of technical accounting questions. Had an interview with everyone on the team as well as the CEO. They asked a lot of questions about your 5 year plan and what you want to achieve from the job.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 tears

title: Sales Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Making Waves Foundation (Bountiful, UT) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by email to come in for an interview. Upon arrival, I spoke to assistant manager to get to know the company better and for the manager to know more about me. I was informed that there was a three part hiring process and a two week training program aimed at progression into a management position.
Interview Questions: What is your greatest strength? What is your greatest weakness? What makes you a good candidate?

title: Annual Giving Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Making Waves Foundation (Richmond, CA) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview...terrible connection..had to ask many times to repeat questions.  Played a weird Jeopardy type game which through me completely off guard not to mention how many times I said can you repeat that.  Said he would get back to me in a week and never heard a word.
